title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 302.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 302.1 - Purpose

State Regulations
(a) These regulations are
promulgated pursuant to section
343
(5)(b)
of the Personal Property Law ("PPL") and set forth the procedures for the operation of an alternative
arbitration mechanism (the "Program"). (b) These regulations are designed to promote the independent, speedy, efficient and fair disposition of disputes concerning the assessment of excess wear and/or damage to leased vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
302.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
